# R Packages

This chapter lists all the packages necessary for plotting

## Data processing

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data packages

### Large dataset

```{r}
#install_github("thiyangt/elephants")
library(elephants)
data("elephants")
```

### Small dataset

```{r}
elephants.subset.100 <- elephants |> sample_n(100)
```
